evergreen.description: Always growing, always green, and always calm, evergreen nodes are slowly updated over time.

archived.description: Once legendary, for one reason or another these nodes fell from fame. For historic reasons, I keep them around, but heed my advice and never take them at face value, even if your life depends on it!

unstable.description: Updating at the speed of light, blink once and a word could be gone! These nodes are erratic, unstable, and dangerous, but that's why they are fun.

sunset.description: All good things must come to an end, but that's a good thing. The end of a day means the start of a new one. Sunset posts were once evergreens, but now they are ready to give life to new pages

seed.description: Still young, while seeds don't look like anything much, they have the power to grow into something beautiful if kindled and given room to flourish.

blog.description: A fleshed out story, one you just might want to read.

links.description: Things I've found in my crusades around the web, and occasionally my thoughts on them.

garden.description: A network of color and character, one node alone is nothing, but together beautiful.

data.description: Open source data collected for various nodes
